title: Product List Viewed Event Data
description: Data payload for the ecommerce.product_list_viewed event. Fired when a user views a list of products such as a category page, search results, or recommendation carousel.

listId.description: A unique identifier for the product list.

listName.description: The human-readable name of the product list (e.g. 'Search Results', 'You May Also Like').

products.description: The list of products that were displayed to the user.
